Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Ken Watanabe's character in *Transformers: Age of Extinction*?
Options:
A. a) Ken Watanabe plays the character Drift.
B. b) Drift is a Samurai-motif Autobot.
C. c) Drift transforms into a Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse.
D. d) Drift is a human character in the film.
Answer: a) Ken Watanabe plays the character Drift., b) Drift is a Samurai-motif Autobot., c) Drift transforms into a Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the character Drift in *Transformers: Age of Extinction*?
Options:
A. a) Ken Watanabe voices the character Drift.
B. b) Drift is a Samurai-motif Autobot.
C. c) Drift can transform into a Sikorsky S-97 Raider Helicopter.
